response.question:
// This is a decade counter that counts from 0 through 9, inclusive. It counts only when slowena is high.
module count_slow(input clk, input slowena, input reset, output reg [3:0] q);
outputs:
```verilog
module count_slow(
    input clk,
    input slowena,
    input reset,
    output reg [3:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 4'b0000; // Reset the counter to 0
    end else if (slowena) begin
        if (q == 4'b1001) begin
            q <= 4'b0000; // Reset to 0 after reaching 9
        end else begin
            q <= q + 1; // Increment the counter
        end
    end
end

endmodule
```

```verilog
module advshift(
    input clk,
    input load,
    input ena,
    input [1:0] amount,
    input [63:0] data,
    output reg [63:0] q
);
    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (load) begin
            q <= data;
        end else if (ena) begin
            case (amount)
                2'b00: q <= {q[62:0], 1'b0};          // Shift left by 1 bit
                2'b01: q <= {q[55:0], 8'b0};          // Shift left by 8 bits
                2'b10: q <= {q[63], q[63:1]};         // Shift right by 1 bit (arithmetic)
                2'b11: q <= {{8{q[63]}}, q[63:8]};    // Shift right by 8 bits (arithmetic)
                default: q <= q;                      // Default case to hold value
            endcase
        end
    end
endmodule
```

module priority_encoder(
    input [2:0] in,
    output reg [1:0] pos
);

always @(*) begin
    casez (in)
        3'b1??: pos = 2'b10; // Highest priority for bit 2
        3'b01?: pos = 2'b01; // Next priority for bit 1
        3'b001: pos = 2'b00; // Lowest priority for bit 0
        default: pos = 2'b00; // Default case if no bits are high
    endcase
end

endmodule

response.question:
// This is a shift left and rotate operation
module left_rotate(input clk,input reset,input [2:0] amount,input [7:0] data,input load,output reg [7:0] out);
outputs:
```verilog
module left_rotate(
    input clk,
    input reset,
    input [2:0] amount,
    input [7:0] data,
    input load,
    output reg [7:0] out
);

always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
    if (reset) begin
        out <= 8'b0;
    end else if (load) begin
        out <= data;
    end else begin
        out <= (out << amount) | (out >> (8 - amount));
    end
end

endmodule
```

```verilog
module left_rotate(
    input clk,
    input reset,
    input [2:0] amount,
    input [7:0] data,
    input load,
    output reg [7:0] out
);

always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
    if (reset) begin
        out <= 8'b0;
    end else if (load) begin
        out <= data;
    end else begin
        out <= (out << amount) | (out >> (8 - amount));
    end
end

endmodule
```

(

    input [ADDR_WIDTH-1:0] addr,

);

endmodule
